name: Potential 7za.DLL Sideloading
author: X__Junior

detection.query:
selection: {"ImageLoaded|endswith": "\\7za.dll"}
filter_main_legit_path: {"Image|startswith": ["C:\\Program Files (x86)\\", "C:\\Program Files\\"], "ImageLoaded|startswith": ["C:\\Program Files (x86)\\", "C:\\Program Files\\"]}

falsepositives: Legitimate third party application located in "AppData" may leverage this DLL to offer 7z compression functionality and may generate false positives. Apply additional filters as needed.
